name: Richard Gonzales
text: The manager is great here. I go to this hungry howies often amd I see him working hard for his store and his staff. The quality is significantly better since he has taken over about 2 years now.

text: We normally order the pizza from there we tried the sandwiches today worst place ever what is steak and cheese sandwich it ended up getting a veggie sandwich I left my food outside where ants were you want to order something do Papa John's ‚Ä¶More

Second time ordering from this location.

name: Raquel Turner
text: These guys are super awesome!! Amazing pizza and the best customer service!! Thank you for being Great!!!

name: Jordan Harstad
text: I watched staff eating while making pizzas in the back, not wearing masks, and also making salads without gloves (using their bare hands without washing prior).  So many cross contamination issues in the middle of a pandemic! ‚Ä¶More

name: Krista Stephenson
text: Very friendly staff! This was our first visit here and we were pleasantly surprised! The buffet was delicious. They kept putting hot pizzas out. If you don't see a specific pizza you want, they'll make it. Everything on the salad bar was so ‚Ä¶More

name: Ellen Boyd
text: Love this place. I wish there were more locations.  Notably better than other chains. Not NY or Chicago style. Just great chain pizza. Also good pocket sandwich things. I think called Calzones.

name: Eden Miller
text: Service was fine, but I saw the same issue. No one working was wearing a mask, despite the sign mandating masks while on the clock. Outside, a sign reads ‚ÄúNo mask, no entry.‚Äù Clearly that doesn‚Äôt apply to employees too. Disappointed to see this negligence in a pandemic.

name: Darius Hairston
text: A Midwest favorite. As a Midwest native I love this place. It makes me feel closer to home Everytime. Good food good service. I love it

name: Jeff H
text: This place has the best pizza it super fresh it tastes amazing the ingredients are awesome the bread is literally made in the building I love all the coupons I got for this place it keeps me coming back, the bbq pizza is amazing

name: Victoria Bradley
text: Order one pizza which took over an hour. I called the store when it said my order was complete (though it wasn‚Äôt) and the person I spoke to said oh it will get there, the app says it‚Äôs complete when it runs out of time. Well 10 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Fisher
text: Good food, good service, good value

name: Matt Maloy
text: Impressive! I ordered my food at 8:41pm and at 8:59pm, my food arrived at my front door piping hot. The driver was cool and the food was well cooked, but the breadsticks were a bit too oily and the cheese a bit too salty for my taste. But well done to my local Hungry Howie homies for coming through clutch. üëä

text: Can't give this place (specifically) enough credit. Besides 1simple mess up that was totally taken care of.. My order always comes out exactly the way I want it, and taste delicious. I'm from Chicago, and the people around me who are also from Chicago, can't deny HH is surprisingly great. High or not. üëå

text: Love their loyalty program.  Sign up before you order online and next time you get a free pizza : )

text: Pizza is always good bit tonight we got pizza and wings. The wings are no good. Didn't even look like real chicken, more like the cheap banquet chicken nuggets you buy from the store ü§Æ

name: Regina Logsdon

name: Fredy Sanchez
text: I came here and Tony was busting his butt and being professional and friendly the whole time. He said he was working 7 days straight and he was still full of energy. I'll be back for sure just cuz of him. Thanks Tony! Don't work too hard!

name: Nick Sandoval
text: The pizza usually tastes great!!! Last four times I've gone, they've failed to fully slice the pizza all the way through. That is pretty frustrating, considering that is such a basic part of making a pizza. How hard is that? They also ‚Ä¶More

name: Kirk Alvers
text: Ordered online, said it would ready in 15-20 minutes. I waited until the app said the order was ready to go pick it up. Upon arriving, the guy behind the counter handed me a pizza. It wasn‚Äôt my order. I told him so. He then told me to wait. ‚Ä¶More

name: Carlos Henry
text: I just made a crazy order of 7 pizzas and this guy had them all done and ready in 15 min. Really friendly and helpful. Wish I would've gotten his name. Will order from there again.

text: This place is awesome . Phenomenal customer service. Hot pizza made the way you ask. They also take EBT hot meal benefits.

name: Kristen Gentry
text: This Hungry Howies was AMAZING! They fulfilled our order perfectly and it was faster than the online tracker quote and fresh and hot. Ive been in Pizza business for over 7 years and I highly recommend this place. Great job!

name: Carlo McCoy
text: No Matter What Location Calls My Name, I Shall Come...Uhhhh "Running!"  My BBQ Rub On Those Chicken Limbs Were "The Bomb."  Thanks Again For A Good Date...Greeting, Branding And Closing Suggestion.  I Came  Happy With Blazing Energy And Smiles, Thanking Everyone.  However, Not Reciprocated.

text: Both pizzas were tilted during delivery one came smashed. The other pizza was thin crust and half of the cheese slid to one side of the box. The pizzas were also not sliced all the way through.The Howie cheese bread was the star.

name: Valencia Keck
text: Not as good as other locations. We loved Hungry Howie's pizza in Texas, and we were excited to see a Hungry Howie's so close to where we moved. That has changed. We've tried this location a few times. I'm not a fan, so I started ordering it ‚Ä¶More

text: Not satisfied I ordered 2 Xtra large pizzas and they are not xlarge the pizzas  look more like regular large, Howie bread was salty, the boneless wings were dry... Not satisfied at all 12-31-2017....

name: Brian B.
text: Awesome food. I don't understand the service complaints of others. It's not even done in! Relax! Food is good and contact time with staff is like 5 min. Never experienced poor service myself and frequent almost twice a month.
